import pandas as pd # Download the dataset from Kaggle !kaggle datasets download -d shilongzhuang/us-school-shootings-19702022 # Unzip the downloaded file !unzip us-school-shootings-19702022.zip # Read the CSV file into a pandas DataFrame df = pd.read_csv('us-school-shootings-19702022.csv') # Filter the DataFrame for incidents between 2010 and 2024 with fatalities filtered_df = df[(df['year'] >= 2010) & (df['year'] <= 2024) & (df['fatalities'] > 0)] # Select the required columns result_df = filtered_df[['date', 'state', 'location', 'name', 'age', 'gender', 'status', 'fatalities', 'injuries']] # Print the result print(result_df.to_markdown()) | date | state | location | name | age | gender | status | fatalities | injuries | |------------|---------|--------------------------------------------|----------------|-----|--------|-----------------|------------|----------| | 2010/02/18 | Florida | Broward County, Parkland | Nikolas Cruz | 19 | Male | Died in custody | 17 | 14 | | 2012/07/18 | Illinois| South Holland, Waubneet Junior High School | James E.
